member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.applySettings
member.summary: Updates the mixed reality settings to the current settings.

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.isChromaKeyConfigEnabled(int) const
member.summary: Returns the current value indicating if the chroma key configuration with the specified index is enabled.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range from 0 to config count - 1.
member.returns: 1 the chroma key configuration is enabled; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.setChromaKeyConfigEnabled(int,bool)
member.summary: Sets a new value indicating if the chroma key configuration with the specified index is enabled.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range from 0 to config count - 1.
1 to enable the chroma key configuration; 0 to disable it.

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.getChromaKeyConfigFalloff(int) const
member.summary: Returns the current tolerance falloff values for HSV components of the chroma key target color.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range from 0 to config count - 1.
member.returns: Current tolerance falloff values for HSV components of the chroma key target color. The range for each component is [0.0; 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.setChromaKeyConfigFalloff(int,Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Sets new tolerance falloff values for HSV components of the chroma key target color.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range from 0 to config count - 1.
New tolerance falloff values to be set for HSV components of the chroma key target color. The range for each component is [0.0; 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.getChromaKeyConfigTargetColor(int) const
member.summary: Returns the current chroma key target color.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range from 0 to config count - 1.
member.returns: Current chroma key target color in HSV colorspace. The range for each component is [0.0; 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.setChromaKeyConfigTargetColor(int,Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Sets a new chroma key target color.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range from 0 to config count - 1.
New chroma key target color to be set in HSV colorspace. The range for each component is [0.0; 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.getChromaKeyConfigTolerance(int) const
member.summary: Returns the current tolerance values for HSV components of the chroma key target color.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range from 0 to config count - 1.
member.returns: Current tolerance values for HSV components of the chroma key target color. The range for each component is [0.0; 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.setChromaKeyConfigTolerance(int,Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Sets new tolerance values for HSV components of the chroma key target color.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range from 0 to config count - 1.
New tolerance values for HSV components of the chroma key target color to be set. The range for each component is [0.0; 1.0].

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.applyChromaKeySettings(int) const
member.summary: Updates the settings of the chroma key configuration with the specified index to the current settings.
member.param: Chroma key config index in the range from 0 to config count - 1.

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.getCameraSupportedRawExposureTimes const
member.summary: Returns a vector containing the exposure time values that are set as valid for the connected device.
member.returns: The vector containing the exposure time values.

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.getCameraSupportedRawWhiteBalances const
member.summary: Returns a vector containing the white balance values that are set as valid for the connected device.
member.returns: The vector containing the white balance values.

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.getCameraSupportedRawISO const
member.summary: Returns a vector containing the ISO values that are set as valid for the connected device.
member.returns: The vector containing the ISO values.

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.getCameraSupportedRawFlickerCompensations const
member.summary: Returns a vector containing the flicker compensation values that are set as valid for the connected device.
member.returns: The vector containing the flicker compensation values.

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.getMarkerObject(short) const
member.summary: Returns the marker object with the specified index.

member.name: M:Unigine.VRMixedReality.getMarkerObjectByID(short) const
member.summary: Returns the marker object with the specified ID.

member.name: F:Unigine.VRMixedReality.BLEND_MASKING_MODE_BEGIN
member.summary: The first element to be used for iteration.

member.name: F:Unigine.VRMixedReality.BLEND_MASKING_MODE_DISABLED
member.summary: Masking mode is disabled.

member.name: F:Unigine.VRMixedReality.BLEND_MASKING_MODE_RESTRICT_VIDEO_TO_MASK
member.summary: Show the video pass-through image (VST) in the mask. Can be used with chroma key.

member.name: F:Unigine.VRMixedReality.BLEND_MASKING_MODE_RESTRICT_VR_TO_MASK
member.summary: Show VR in the mask. Can be used with chroma key.

member.name: F:Unigine.VRMixedReality.BLEND_MASKING_MODE_RESTRICT_VR_TO_CHROMAKEY_REDUCED_BY_MASK
member.summary: Show VR in the mask and chroma elsewhere. Requires chroma key.

member.name: F:Unigine.VRMixedReality.BLEND_MASKING_MODE_END
member.summary: The last element to be used for iteration.

member.name: F:Unigine.VRMixedReality.CAMERA_PROPERTY_MODE_DISABLED
member.summary: The camera property adjustment is disabled.

member.name: F:Unigine.VRMixedReality.CAMERA_PROPERTY_MODE_AUTO
member.summary: Automatic property adjustment for the camera.

member.name: F:Unigine.VRMixedReality.CAMERA_PROPERTY_MODE_MANUAL
member.summary: Manual property adjustment for the camera. In this mode you can set the desired property value (exposure time correction, white balance correction, ISO) manually via the corresponding methods.
